name: WebGLRenderingContext.isRenderbuffer
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.isRenderbuffer() method of the WebGL API returns true if the passed WebGLRenderbuffer is valid and false otherwise.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'isRenderbuffer' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glIsRenderbuffer' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
